nodes.text: Kirr Ltd. was an influential trading company directed by the Souma Triaz Kirr at the time of the Galactic Civil War. The company possessed many trading posts in scattered locations across the galaxy. When Triaz Kirr joined the Rebel Alliance, Kirr Ltd. served as a cover for the Tlan-Kirr line, a network of hidden warehouses that provided the Rebels with supplies.
The Kirr Ltd. (in French Kirr SA) only appeared in Les démons de feu, a roleplaying adventure published in the 25th issue of French gaming magazine Graal.
